title: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero
description: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero is an action platform game where you can play both as a hero and a zombie boss. When you play as a stickman hero, shoot all the zombies and gather other stickmen to be your allies. When you play as a zombie boss, you need to chase the stickman hero and make all his allies to be zombies. Good luck!
